mapper.select: select p.* from t_user u,t_user_role ur,t_role_permission rp,t_permission p where u.id=ur.user_id and ur.role_id=rp.role_id and rp.permission_id=p.id and u.user_name=#{username}
select r.* from t_user u,t_user_role ur,t_role r where u.id=ur.role_id and ur.role_id=r.id and u.user_name=#{username}
